      • setScanMode

        public ScanContext.Builder setScanMode(ScanMode scanMode)
        Sets Scan Mode. Android L comes with functionality controlling scan performance. there are three predefined variables according to which device scan may be handled depending on user's choice. Our SDK takes advantage fo this feature for devices running on Android Lollipop and higher. For devices running on Android OS with version lower than Lollipop this parameter does not affect scan performance. You can set one of three values: ScanMode.BALANCED - perform Bluetooth LE scan in balanced power mode. ScanMode.LOW_LATENCY - scan using highest duty cycle. ScanMode.LOW_POWER - perform Bluetooth LE scan in low power mode.
        Parameters:
        scanMode - the scan mode
        Returns:
        the builder instance
